> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled and said "I'm the Predacon commander in Ancient Earth... Now,
> lets finish the talkie talkie... Lets go"
>
> Hdyras started to follow them. Even though he looked careless, his eyes were
> wide opened and payed attention to all details.

<NEW>

HELLSCREAM shrugged, "Ahh, leader of ANCIENT Predacons, what is a few
years among friends?" His smile was dark and charismatic, the smile of
of spider welcoming a fly into his lair.

The trip was relatively quick. As JHIAXUS followed the course laid out
for him they are quickly brough to a rather large spaceship hovering
in midair, the front section of it rounded and covered with spikes
gives it a very menacing look asif it were a flying mace.

The shuttle makes its way to a hanger deck and lands.

"Welcome to the Galvabug II" HELLSCREAM said as the doors opened to
show the hanger deck itself.

HELLSCREAM Gestured to HYDRAS as he nodded, "Come with me." he said as
he turned to leave but never quite taking his optics off of him.

(TAG)

- Preston
